OroAzul is a proposal to the worldwide environmental community.

It's a road map for converting to sustainable ocean energy by 2100 & remediating the biosphere.

tweets.text: @Parrog3 @AffinityWater @EnvAgency @OliverHealdUK @IvelRev @AquiferChalk What indeed. Apparently the aquifer has risen enough for the pumps keeping the Shep artificially flowing at Fowlmere to be turned off earlier than usual so there is hope for some but perhaps not for the upper reaches of the Ivel Quin Rib Ash Beane & Stort until abstraction stops.

Our officers are on site at the major fire in Bradford today using pumps to get rid of water contaminated by the tyres.

We're supporting @WYFRS, @PHE_YorksHumber; @bradfordmdc & @YorkshireWater 
More than 40 members of our staff are working 24/7 to help

https://t.co/pPw7LMTzbX https://t.co/AUtpJZmHmi
Blimey, please keep us posted on this Tom. Well done for reporting to EA. What has killed all the fish? https://t.co/2AdC2ty9T0
A little bit of floodplain reconnection brings a little joy to the heart #cockercatchment ‚Å¶@EnvAgencyNW‚Å© https://t.co/7fw7BzPYrL
@DoddyDodds @InnesThomson @EnvAgencyYNE @ERfloodrisk @NFUtweets @CLAtweets @GroundwaterMike That's just crazy talk ;-)

Not just special circumstances missing from this dev, no onsite parking, facilities or littler bins! Big thank you to @PaulHooton5 for clearing the mess left by @AmazonNewsUK @KelloggsUKI carriers. @StHelensEnviro @EnvAgency @MerPolTraffic @sthelensstar @sthelenscouncil https://t.co/L3IWGab3tF

@InnesThomson @EnvAgencyYNE @ERfloodrisk @NFUtweets @CLAtweets @GroundwaterMike @GarethDLaT #EAR #ARR just think if we had an integrated water resources management strategy & regulators that understand what it means, we could benefit several times over from flood management.

I‚Äôm trialling a @KISTERS_UK HyQuest Solutions #FlyingFox coupled with a @SonTekYSI #M9 #ADCP, and getting great repeatable flow results. Cold water gauging has never been so pleasurable! #Cliburn @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/5ggxWx0z1q

tweets.text: @LDNWaterkeeper @EnvAgencySE @WestReservoir @WildWoodberry Will do and will update you too

@pmandrews1973 @WorcsWT @DesAvocet @wheatearlp The area @pmandrews1973 refers to is Amy's Marsh. This was created in 1993 by Alan Jones & Brian Draper from National Rivers Authority now @EnvAgencyMids . It is now in need of a bit of TLC. Seeing what can be achieved at @LaneMarsh in a few days gives me hope for #uptonwarren ü§û
Would be great to see the southern end of the Moors Pool at #uptonwarren undergo a similar extensive reprofiling @WorcsWT @upstarts1979 @DesAvocet @wheatearlp https://t.co/0SUUbV0NFl

@bradfordmdc @EnvAgencyYNE Please have a look at these screenshots from the Bradford Planning Portal and the EA public register. Is it the case that the tyre recycling site at 1394 Leeds Road has an EnvAgency licence but no planning permission from the Council? #bradfordfire https://t.co/uIqlZFyKq8
@RussellB1ggs @Parrog3 @AffinityWater @EnvAgency @OliverHealdUK @IvelRev @AquiferChalk @WaterREast @AnglianWater My mistake. I though I heard ‚ÄúKing‚Äôs Lynn‚Äù https://t.co/uJ6oGgX1Yr
@tommustill @EnvAgencySE @WestReservoir @WildWoodberry You can ring back in a couple of days and get an update.
@EnvAgencySE @WestReservoir @WildWoodberry @LDNWaterkeeper Hi Peter Thank you I‚Äôve called up and have incident number 1865140 and officer is going to investigate
@tommustill @WestReservoir @WildWoodberry @LDNWaterkeeper Tom, if you get a chance to call this in, we can take more details, and get the local fisheries officers involved: 0800 807060. Thanks, Peter
@RussellB1ggs @Parrog3 @AffinityWater @EnvAgency @OliverHealdUK @IvelRev @AquiferChalk @WaterREast @AnglianWater Which constituency MP(s) represents that catchment?
Dead roach. Lots. Time 13.57. Saturday 21 Nov. New river looking disgusting blue green. https://t.co/BScrpa589F

I'm a bit late to the party but finally contributing to the #30DayMapChallenge and so for the theme of water here are some flood modelling results from my MSc dissertation 7 years ago. Thanks to @OrdnanceSurvey for the base mapping and @EnvAgency for the 1D model inputs! https://t.co/m9Ub7jOlmP

Thanks @Shoothill @GaugeMap @AlanBarrierEA @EnvAgencySE - for this gauge reading @riverlevel_1947 which I use to plan kayak trips from Kew. Can you explain what caused this incredible >400m3/sec spike - which I‚Äôd want to avoid paddling with/against! Is it rainfall or tidal surge? https://t.co/kzNI2wUHJA

tweets.text: @Thames21 @thameswater @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency https://t.co/NJi24FbjkO

@NWFishEA @EnvAgencyNW @warringtonnews We are concerned that something is feeding it from one of the other inlets, we have members wanting to no why the water is still shut and what we are doing, we are very concerned about our water we have purchased our own airator which we have had on there running.

@burrows_andy @EnvAgencyNW @warringtonnews I‚Äôll not deny it is unusual but not unheard of, I‚Äôll make sure your information gets to the investigating Officer. Read this, it‚Äôs not a UK publication but the science is accurate.  https://t.co/3nS5oel4YO

@NWFishEA @EnvAgencyNW @warringtonnews Badly wrong to be getting these issues at this time of the year, water temperature is dropping so should the algae, but it‚Äôs not, it‚Äôs getting worse day by day, the more rain we have the worse it gets.

Brown trout spawning in the centre of Nottingham not something I would of expected!
@WildTroutTrust @Trent_R_Trust @TrentGateway @Nottswildlife @EnvAgencyMids @lte_catchment https://t.co/Qkns405Fhb

Register for the virtual #Ineson2020 Lecture here!!!üëáüëá
The event is free this year&held jointly with @Geolsoc_hydro & @IAH_Ireland. The lecture will be delivered by Anne Dacey, @EnvAgency on the future of UK #groundwater post-2020, sign up now!!
https://t.co/EQPB5wtxpH

@burrows_andy @EnvAgencyNW @warringtonnews The lake immediately upstream has no issues so it‚Äôs not an inflow water problem; a localised issue through an unknown occurrence of high nutrient input. Poss‚Äô a build up of excessive baiting = poor water quality. The fish aren‚Äôt in distress. We‚Äôll investigate further if required.

@DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @10DowningStreet @WildlifeTrusts @ManCityCouncil @MCCWythenshawe @MayorofGM @LordMayorOfMcr

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyNW @warringtonnews @NWFishEA It‚Äôs a pity you haven‚Äôt been as proactive with our club water, twice you have been out to a algae bloom that‚Äôs now been bad for over 6 weeks, not even taken a water sample! Absolutely disgraceful what do we pay our rod license fees for ??

Lots of Fairy Rings spotted at the excellent Ellis Meadows in Leicester this afternoon. Commonly formed by the Field Mushroom (Agaricus campestris), these tend to be around 6 feet (2 m) in diameter. #UrbanWildlife @Leicester_News  @EnvAgencyMids @NEEastMidlands @LeicsWildlife https://t.co/eMyndgkjAE
